name: PathTracker Android
desc: Real time path tracking and stastics app. Built using Kotlin, XML, RoomDB, MVVM, Android Services, Google Map

name: Notes App Android
desc: Native android app built using Kotlin, XML, Firebase, Room Database, MVVM. Simple notes app with login- signup features.

name: Weather App Android
desc: Native android app built using Kotlin, XML and Retrofit. Provides weather forecast.

desc: Shayari App with frontend using native android in Kotlin and back-end using PHP, MySQL.

name: Video Streaming WebSite
desc: Frontend based Video Streaming / calling website with Agora-RTC API.

name: N-Queens
desc: An interactive app where users place the N Queens on an NxN chessboard, using data structures concepts like backtracking algorithms to validate their solutions..
